note.p: Draft lines for "Fancies at Navesink," first published in The Nineteenth Century (1885).

bibl.author: Whitman, Walt
bibl.title: Fancies at Navesink
bibl.orgName: The Thomas Biggs Harned Collection of the Papers of Walt Whitman, Library of Congress, Washington, D.C.
bibl.note: Transcribed from digital images of the original.
The verso contains more drafted phrases, including "Turn of the tide" and "And" written twice.
